data.name: Bamboo Scrap
data.desc: Tribute 1 Plant-Type monster. Special Summon 2 "Plant Tokens" (Plant-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 800/DEF 500) to your opponent's side of the field in Defense Position.

data.name: Battle Mania
data.desc: Activate only during your opponent's Standby Phase. All face-up monsters your opponent controls are changed to Attack Position, and cannot change their battle positions this turn. All monsters your opponent currently controls must attack this turn, if able.

data.name: Black Garden
data.desc: If a monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned face-up, except by the effect of "Black Garden": Halve its ATK, then, the controller of that monster Special Summons 1 "Rose Token" (Plant/DARK/Level 2/ATK 800/DEF 800) to their opponent's field in Attack Position. (This ATK loss remains even if this card leaves the field.) You can target 1 monster in your GY with ATK equal to the total ATK of all Plant monsters on the field; destroy this card and as many Plant monsters on the field as possible, then, if you destroyed all of them, Special Summon that targeted monster.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Duelists: Sisters of the Rose

data.name: Black Rose Dragon
data.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
When this card is Synchro Summoned: You can destroy all cards on the field. Once per turn: You can banish 1 Plant monster from your GY, then target 1 Defense Position monster your opponent controls; change that target to face-up Attack Position, and if you do, its ATK becomes 0 until the end of this turn.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Duelists: Sisters of the Rose

data.name: Botanical Girl
data.desc: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, you can add 1 Plant-Type monster with 1000 or less DEF from your Deck to your hand.

data.name: Botanical Lion
data.desc: This card gains 300 ATK for each Plant-Type monster you control. Control of this face-up card on the field cannot switch.

card_sets.set_name: Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants

data.name: Cactus Fighter
data.desc: If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, Special Summon 1 "Needle Token" (Plant-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 500/DEF 500) to your opponent's side of the field in Defense Position.

data.name: Card Rotator
data.desc: Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard. Change the battle positions of all monsters your opponent controls. (Face-down Defense Position monsters are flipped to face-up Attack Position.)

data.name: Comrade Swordsman of Landstar
data.desc: All Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 400 ATK.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Confusion Chaff
data.desc: Activate only when your opponent declares a second direct attack during the same Battle Phase. Conduct battle between the attacking monster and the first monster that attacked directly (other effects cannot be activated during this battle).

data.name: Copy Plant
data.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 other Plant-Type monster on the field that has a Level; this card's Level becomes that monster's current Level, until the end of this turn.

data.name: Cursed Fig
data.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Target 2 Set Spell/Trap Cards on the field; while this card is in the Graveyard, those Set cards cannot be activated.

data.name: DNA Checkup
data.desc: Select 1 face-down monster you control. Your opponent declares 2 Attributes. Reveal the selected monster. If its Attribute is one of the declared Attributes, your opponent draws 2 cards. If not, you draw 2 cards.

data.name: Doomkaiser Dragon
data.desc:
"Plaguespreader Zombie" + 1 or more non-Tuner Zombie-Type monsters
When this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 Zombie-Type monster in your opponent's Graveyard; Special Summon that target to your side of the field in face-up Attack Position, but destroy it when this card leaves the field.

data.name: Doppelganger
data.desc: When you take damage from the effect of a monster your opponent controls, inflict the same amount of damage to your opponent.

data.name: Elemental HERO Divine Neos
data.desc: Must be Fusion Summoned using any 5 "Neos", "Neo Space", "Neo-Spacian", or "HERO" monsters, including at least 1 "Neos" or "Neo Space" monster, 1 "Neo-Spacian" monster, and 1 "HERO" monster, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Once per turn: You can banish 1 "Neos", "Neo Space", "Neo-Spacian", or "HERO" monster from your Graveyard; this card gains 500 ATK, and until the End Phase it also gains the banished monster's effects.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Everliving Underworld Cannon
data.desc: Once per turn, when a Zombie-Type monster is Special Summoned to your side of the field: Inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Factory of 100 Machines
data.desc: Remove from play all "Morphtronic" monsters from your Graveyard. Target face-up Machine-Type monster you control gains 200 ATK for each card removed, until the End Phase.

data.name: Fragrance Storm
data.desc: Target 1 Plant-Type monster on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, draw 1 card, then if that card is a Plant-Type monster, you can reveal it and draw 1 more card.

data.name: Gadget Driver
data.desc: You can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard and select any number of face-up "Morphtronic" monsters you control. Change the battle position of the selected monster(s). This effect can be activated during either player's turn.

data.name: Gadget Hauler
data.desc: Once per turn, you can send any number of "Morphtronic" monsters from your hand to the Graveyard to have this card gain 800 ATK for each.

data.name: Giant Trap Hole
data.desc: When 2 or more monsters are Special Summoned at the same time: Destroy all monsters on the field.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Gigantic Cephalotus
data.desc: This card gains 200 ATK each time a Plant-Type monster is sent from the field to the Graveyard.

data.name: Gladiator Beast Retiari
data.desc: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, you can remove from play 1 card from your opponent's Graveyard. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, you can return it to the Deck to Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Retiari".

data.name: Goblin Decoy Squad
data.desc: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can draw 1 card. If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase. This card's battle position cannot be changed until the end of your next turn, except with a card effect.

data.name: Goka, the Pyre of Malice
data.desc: If you control a FIRE monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). When you do: Target 1 FIRE monster you control; destroy that target. During each of your Standby Phases: Special Summon 1 "Fireball Token" (Pyro-Type/FIRE/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 100) in Defense Position. You can Tribute 1 other FIRE monster; this card gains 500 ATK until the End Phase.

card_sets.set_name: Onslaught of the Fire Kings Structure Deck

data.name: Gozen Match
data.desc: Each player can only control 1 Attribute of monster. Send all other face-up monsters they control to the GY.

data.name: Hanewata
data.desc: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; you take no effect damage this turn.

data.name: Healing Wave Generator
data.desc: Once per turn, you can select another face-up monster you control to gain Life Points equal to that monster's Level x 100.

data.name: Horseytail
data.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Horseytail Token" (Plant-Type/WIND/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) to your opponent's side of the field in Defense Position. When this Token is destroyed by battle with a Plant-Type monster, its controller sends 1 card from their hand to the Graveyard.

data.name: Iron Chain Blaster
data.desc: Once per turn, you can send 1 "Iron Chain" monster you control to the Graveyard to inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

data.name: Iron Chain Coil
data.desc: Once per turn, you can select 1 "Iron Chain" monster you control to have it gain 300 ATK and DEF as long as this card is face-up on the field.

data.name: Iron Chain Dragon
data.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
You can remove from play all "Iron Chain" monsters from your Graveyard to have this card gain 200 ATK for each card removed, until the End Phase. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, send the top 3 cards of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard.

data.name: Iron Chain Repairman
data.desc: When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict 300 damage to your opponent. Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Iron Chain" monster from your Graveyard, except "Iron Chain Repairman". This card cannot attack the turn you activate this effect.

data.name: Iron Chain Snake
data.desc: During your Main Phase, you can equip this card to 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. That monster loses 800 ATK and DEF. When it is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, its controller sends cards equal to its Level from the top of their Deck to the Graveyard.

data.name: Jade Knight
data.desc: While this card is in Attack Position, Machine-Type monsters you control with 1200 or less ATK cannot be destroyed by Trap effects. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can add 1 Level 4 LIGHT Machine-Type monster from your Deck to your hand.

data.name: Lineage of Destruction
data.desc: Activate only during a turn in which you destroyed a Defense Position monster your opponent controlled. Select 1 Level 8 monster you control. During this turn, the selected monster can attack twice.

data.name: Machine Lord Ur
data.desc: This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each. If this card attacks or is attacked, your opponent takes no battle damage.

card_sets.set_name: Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants

data.name: Mad Archfiend
data.desc: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. If this face-up Attack Position card is targeted for an attack: Change it to Defense Position.

data.name: Mark of the Rose
data.desc: Activate this card by banishing 1 Plant monster from your GY, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; equip this card to it. Take control of the equipped monster. Once per turn, during your End Phase: Negate this card's effect until your next Standby Phase.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Duelists: Sisters of the Rose

data.name: Miracle Fertilizer
data.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 Plant monster in your GY; Special Summon that target. You cannot Normal Summon/Set during the turn you Special Summon with this effect (even if this card leaves the field). If a monster Special Summoned by this effect leaves the field, destroy this card.

data.name: Morphtransition
data.desc: Activate only when a face-up "Morphtronic" monster you control is selected as an attack target. Negate the attack, and change the battle position of the selected "Morphtronic" monster.

data.name: Morphtronic Accelerator
data.desc: Return 1 "Morphtronic" monster from your hand to the Deck. Destroy 1 card on the field, and draw 1 card.

data.name: Morphtronic Boomboxen
data.desc:
● While in Attack Position, this card can attack twice during each Battle Phase.
● Once per turn, while in Defense Position, when a face-up "Morphtronic" monster you control is targeted for an attack: You can negate the attack.

data.name: Morphtronic Cameran
data.desc: ● While in Attack Position: When this card is destroyed by battle, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Morphtronic" monster from your hand or Graveyard, except "Morphtronic Cameran". ● While in Defense Position: "Morphtronic" monsters on the field cannot be targeted by effects.

data.name: Morphtronic Celfon
data.desc:
● While in Attack Position: Once per turn, you can roll a six-sided die. Reveal cards from top of your Deck equal to the roll and Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Morphtronic" monster from among them, ignoring the Summoning conditions. Shuffle the rest into the Deck.
● While in Defense Position: Once per turn, you can roll a six-sided die. Look at cards from top of your Deck equal to the roll, then return them in the same order.

data.name: Morphtronic Clocken
data.desc: ● While in Attack Position: This card gains 500 ATK for each Morph Counter on it. ● While in Defense Position: Once per turn, you can place 1 Morph Counter on this card. You can Tribute this card to inflict 1000 damage to your opponent for each Morph Counter on it.

data.name: Morphtronic Cord
data.desc: Equip only to a "Morphtronic" monster. Each time the equipped monster's battle position is changed, destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

data.name: Morphtronic Datatron
data.desc: ● While in Attack Position: Once per turn, you can Tribute 1 monster to inflict 600 damage to your opponent. ● While in Defense Position: Once per turn, you can inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

data.name: Morphtronic Engine
data.desc: Equip only to a Level 3 "Morphtronic" monster. Its ATK becomes double its original ATK. During your second Standby Phase after this card's activation, destroy this card, and take damage equal to the original ATK of the equipped monster.

data.name: Morphtronic Magnen
data.desc: ● While in Attack Position: If your opponent controls a face-up monster, this card can only select their highest ATK monster as an attack target. ● While in Defense Position: Your opponent cannot select another monster as an attack target.

data.name: Morphtronic Monitron
data.desc: When a "Morphtronic" monster is Summoned, you can change it to face-up Defense Position.

data.name: Morphtronic Radion
data.desc: ● While in Attack Position: "Morphtronic" monsters you control gain 800 ATK. ● While in Defense Position: "Morphtronic" monsters you control gain 1000 DEF.

data.name: Mosaic Manticore
data.desc: During the Standby Phase of your next turn after you Tribute Summoned this face-up card on the field: Special Summon, from the Graveyard, as many monster(s) as possible that were used for its Tribute Summon. They cannot declare an attack, and their effects are negated.

card_sets.set_name: Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants

data.name: Neos Wiseman
data.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by sending 1 face-up "Elemental HERO Neos" and 1 face-up "Yubel" you control to the Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card cannot be destroyed by card effects. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled an opponent's monster: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the monster it battled, and you gain Life Points equal to that monster's DEF.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Nettles
data.desc: If this face-up card would be destroyed, you can destroy 1 face-up Plant-Type monster you control instead.

data.name: Night's End Sorcerer
data.desc: When this card is Special Summoned: You can target up to 2 cards in your opponent's GY; banish them.

data.name: Omega Goggles
data.desc: Equip only to a monster you control. Once per turn, you can look at 1 random card in your opponent's hand. The equipped monster cannot attack the turn you activate this effect.

data.name: Overdrive Teleporter
data.desc: This card cannot be Special Summoned. You can pay 2000 Life Points to Special Summon 2 Level 3 Psychic-Type monsters from your Deck. This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

data.name: Paralyzing Chain
data.desc: When a card(s) is sent from your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard by a card effect, inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

data.name: Plaguespreader Zombie
data.desc: If this card is in your GY: You can place 1 card from your hand on the top of the Deck; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field.

card_sets.set_name: Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants

data.name: Plant Food Chain
data.desc: Target 1 Plant-Type monster you control; equip this card to that target. It gains 500 ATK. If this card is destroyed by a card effect while equipped: You can target 1 Plant-Type monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

data.name: Poison Chain
data.desc: During the End Phase of your turn, if you did not attack, you can make your opponent send cards equal to the number of face-up "Iron Chain" monsters you control from the top of their Deck to the Graveyard.

data.name: Pollinosis
data.desc: When a monster(s) would be Normal or Special Summoned, OR a Spell/Trap Card is activated: Tribute 1 Plant monster; negate the Summon or activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

data.name: Power Injector
data.desc: Once per turn you can pay 600 Life Points to have all face-up Psychic-Type monsters gain 500 ATK during this turn.

data.name: Prideful Roar
data.desc: During damage calculation, if your monster battles an opponent's monster with a higher ATK: Pay LP equal to the difference in ATK; your monster gains ATK equal to that difference +300, during damage calculation only.

data.name: Psychic Jumper
data.desc: Once per turn: You can pay 1000 LP, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls and 1 Psychic-Type monster you control, except "Psychic Jumper"; switch control of both those targets, and if you do, their battle positions cannot be changed this turn.

data.name: Psychic Lifetrancer
data.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn, you can remove from play 1 Psychic-Type monster from your Graveyard to gain 1200 Life Points.

data.name: Psychic Trigger
data.desc: Activate only while your Life Points are lower than your opponent's. Select 2 Psychic-Type monsters in your Graveyard. Remove them from play and draw 2 cards.

data.name: Psychokinesis
data.desc: If you control a Psychic-Type monster: Target 1 card on the field; destroy it, and if you do, take 1000 damage.

data.name: Puppet Master
data.desc: When this card is Tribute Summoned: You can pay 2000 LP, then target 2 Fiend monsters in your GY; Special Summon those targets, but they cannot attack this turn.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack
Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

data.name: Pursuit Chaser
data.desc: When a Defense Position monster is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

data.name: Queen of Thorns
data.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Plant-Type monsters
Each player must pay 1000 LP for each monster Normal or Special Summoned from their hand, except for Plant-Type monsters.

data.name: Rai-Jin
data.desc: All LIGHT monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each LIGHT monster in your Graveyard. During your End Phase, destroy 1 LIGHT monster you control. There can only be 1 face-up "Rai-Jin" on the field.

data.name: Rai-Mei
data.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can add 1 Level 2 or lower LIGHT monster from your Deck to your hand.

data.name: Red Ogre
data.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can send any number of cards from your hand to the Graveyard, then target the same number of cards on the field; return those targets to the hand.

data.name: Revival Gift
data.desc: Select 1 Tuner monster from your Graveyard and Special Summon it. Its effects are negated. Special Summon 2 "Gift Fiend Tokens" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 3/ATK 1500/DEF 1500) to your opponent's side of the field.

data.name: Revived King Ha Des
data.desc:
"Plaguespreader Zombie" + 1 or more non-Tuner Zombie-Type monsters
Negate the effects of Effect Monsters destroyed by battle with Zombie-Type monsters you control.

data.name: Rose, Warrior of Revenge
data.desc: When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

card_sets.set_name: Crossroads of Chaos Sneak Peek Participation Card

data.name: Search Striker
data.desc: If this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster, you can destroy the monster immediately with this card's effect without flipping it face-up or applying damage calculation. If you do, this card is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase. This card's battle position cannot be changed until the end of your next turn, except with a card effect.

data.name: Secret Village of the Spellcasters
data.desc: If only you control a Spellcaster monster, your opponent cannot activate Spell Cards. If you control no Spellcaster monsters, you cannot activate Spell Cards.

data.name: Seed of Deception
data.desc: Special Summon 1 Level 2 or lower Plant-Type monster from your hand.

data.name: Seed of Flame
data.desc: When this card you control is destroyed by a card effect and sent to your Graveyard: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Plant-Type monster in your Graveyard, except "Seed of Flame"; Special Summon that target, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Seed Token" (Plant-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) to your opponent's side of the field in Defense Position. This Token cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

data.name: Storm Caller
data.desc: You can put your opponent's monsters that are destroyed by battle with other Psychic-Type monsters on top of their owner's Deck instead of sending them to the Graveyard. When this card is destroyed by a card effect, this card's controller takes damage equal to its original ATK.

data.name: Synchro Strike
data.desc: Target Synchro Summoned monster gains 500 ATK for each Synchro Material Monster used to Summon it, until the End Phase.

data.name: Teleport
data.desc: Once per turn, if your opponent controls a monster and you control no monsters, you can pay 800 Life Points to Special Summon 1 Psychic-Type monster from your hand.

data.name: Tempest Magician
data.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Spellcaster-Type monsters
When this card is Synchro Summoned, place 1 Spell Counter on it. Once per turn, you can discard any number of cards to place 1 Spell Counter on a monster(s) you control for each card you discarded. You can remove all Spell Counters on the field to inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each removed Spell Counter.

data.name: The White Stone of Legend
data.desc: If this card is sent to the GY: Add 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your Deck to your hand.

card_sets.set_name: Saga of Blue-Eyes White Dragon Structure Deck

data.name: The World Tree
data.desc:
Each time a face-up Plant-Type monster(s) on the field is destroyed, place 1 Flower Counter on this card. You can remove any number of Flower Counters from this card to activate these effects.
● 1 Counter: Target 1 Plant-Type monster on the field; that target gains 400 ATK and DEF until the end of this turn. (This ATK gain remains even if this card leaves the field.)
● 2 Counters: Target 1 card on the field; destroy that target.
● 3 Counters: Target 1 Plant-Type monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

data.name: Tiger Dragon
data.desc: When this card is Tribute Summoned by Tributing a Dragon monster: You can target up to 2 Set cards in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone; destroy those targets.

data.name: Time Machine
data.desc: When a monster is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Special Summon that monster to the same field it was on, in the same battle position it was in when destroyed.

Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Speed Duel: Trials of the Kingdom

data.name: Trap of the Imperial Tomb
data.desc: When a Zombie monster(s) is Special Summoned from your opponent's GY to your field: Target 2 cards on the field; destroy them.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Treacherous Trap Hole
data.desc: If you have no Trap Cards in your Graveyard: Target 2 monsters on the field; destroy those targets.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Turbo Synchron
data.desc: When this card declares an attack: You can change the attack target to Defense Position. When you take battle damage while this card is attacking: You can Special Summon 1 monster from your hand with ATK less than or equal to the battle damage you took.

data.name: Turbo Warrior
data.desc:
"Turbo Synchron" + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
When this card declares an attack on a Level 6 or higher Synchro Monster: Halve the ATK of the attack target until the end of the Damage Step. This card cannot be targeted by the effects of Level 6 or lower monsters.

data.name: Tytannial, Princess of Camellias
data.desc: When a card or effect is activated that targets a card(s) on the field (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 face-up Plant monster; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

data.name: Urgent Tuning
data.desc: During the Battle Phase: Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Synchro Monster using monsters you control.

data.name: Virus Cannon
data.desc: Tribute any number of monsters, except Tokens; your opponent sends an equal number of Spells from their Deck to the GY (or all their Spells, if lower than the number of Tributes).

data.name: Wall of Ivy
data.desc: FLIP: Special Summon 1 "Ivy Token" (Plant-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position to your opponent's side of the field. When this Token is destroyed, its controller takes 300 damage.

data.name: Zombie Mammoth
data.desc: Destroy this card if you do not have a Zombie-Type monster in your Graveyard. When this face-up card is destroyed, inflict damage to its controller equal to its original ATK.
